1.More quality talents will be displayed in the "Following" module, you can discover more interesting people easily.
2.Adjusted the video creation entrance, you can choose the creation mode according to your ideas.
3.Added the function of uploading pictures to make Photo Video.
4.The video of 60 second can be uploaded.
